tasks.vendor: rm -rf vendor && deno vendor --no-config --lock=lock.json deps.ts test.deps.ts && deno task merge-import-maps && rm vendor/import_map.json
tasks.test: deno task fmt-check && deno task lint && deno task test-files --coverage=cov --doc test
tasks.cov: deno task test && deno coverage --exclude=vendor/ cov
tasks.report: deno task lcov && genhtml -o html_cov cov.lcov && open html_cov/index.html
